elements.title: Voss (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the runway show for the Alexander McQueen collection Voss included dresses made from razor clams (pictured), microscope slides, and an antique Japanese folding screen?

elements.title: Zhong Jingwen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Zhong Jingwen was known as the "father of Chinese folklore studies"?

elements.title: Galena Schoolhouse (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Galena Schoolhouse in South Dakota was once leased to a historical society for $1 annually?

elements.title: Submarine Mining Service (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the British Army's Submarine Mining Service defended ports and harbours with naval mines and torpedoes?

elements.title: inaugural Canadian Premier League match (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the inaugural Canadian Premier League match led to the suspension of both team captains?

elements.title: Tilman Michael (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Tilman Michael, who is set to be the Metropolitan Opera's chorus master from the 2024/25 season, helped the Oper Frankfurt win multiple awards for operatic choir of the year?

elements.title: 50 YouTubers Fight for $1,000,000 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that "50 YouTubers Fight for $1,000,000" gained more than 70 million views in 24 hours?

elements.title: Thomas Broun (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Thomas Broun has been blamed for inflating the number of beetle species in New Zealand?

elements.title: senior assassin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a school was once evacuated after the water gun of a student playing senior assassin was mistaken for a firearm?
